workflow.name: GPT-4o, RunwayML, ElevenLabs for Social Media
workflow.description:
# üé• AI Tour Video Generator with GPT-4o, RunwayML & ElevenLabs for Social Media'

This **n8n workflow** generates 20-second faceless videos for social media by combining **AI-generated images, audio, and video clips** for a given tour destination.

The output is a ready-to-publish video file, which can be pushed to social platforms and logged in a tracking sheet.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Overview

This system is divided into **4 main sections**:

- üß† **Generate Image Prompts**
- üé® **Generate Media (Images, Videos, Audio)**
- üõ†Ô∏è **Render & Upload**
- üìà **Future Enhancements**

---

## üîå Integration Setup Table

| Integration        | Service Used               | Setup Instruction                                                                 |
|--------------------|----------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **OpenAI**         | GPT-4o (Prompt Generation) | [Get API Key](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys) and configure in n8n   |
| **Google Sheet**   | Idea I/O tracking          | Connect Google account with OAuth/Credentials in n8n                              |
| **Piapia API**     | AI Image Generation        | [Sign up at piapia.ai](https://piapia.ai) and get API key                         |
| **Runway API**     | AI Video Generation        | [Register at runwayml.com](https://runwayml.com) for access                       |
| **ElevenLabs**     | AI Voice Generation        | [Sign up at elevenlabs.io](https://www.elevenlabs.io/) for API key                |
| **CreateMate API** | Render Final Video         | [Visit createmate.ai](https://createmate.ai) to access API                        |
| **Google Drive**   | Upload/Share Final Video   | Use n8n Google Drive node to configure credentials                                |

---

## ‚úÖ Required Services & Tools

Ensure you have active accounts with the following tools and services:

- ‚úÖ OpenAI (GPT-4o + Embeddings)
- ‚úÖ Google Sheets (for destination ideas and tracking)
- ![image.png](fileId:1631)
- ‚úÖ Piapia API (Image generation)
- ‚úÖ RunwayML API (Video generation)
- ‚úÖ ElevenLabs API (Voiceover TTS)
- ‚úÖ Google Drive (Storage & Sharing)
- ‚úÖ CreateMate (Video Rendering)
- ‚úÖ Social Media Scheduler (Optional - Zapier, Buffer, Make.com)

---

## üß† 1. Generate Image Prompts

> **Purpose**: Prepares the content idea and generates visual prompts.

| Step         | Node Name              | Function                                      |
|--------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| üîÅ Trigger   | Schedule or Manual     | Starts the workflow                           |
| üì• Grab Idea | Read Sheet             | Pulls destination idea from Google Sheet      |
| ‚úçÔ∏è Set Content | Manual Input        | Adds structure/narrative to the idea          |
| üîÄ Split     | Split Out              | Breaks input into chunks                      |
| ü§ñ GPT Agent | Image Prompt Agent     | Uses GPT-4o to generate creative image prompts|
| üßπ Clean     | Remove \n              | Cleans up formatting                          |
| üìå Save      | Set Prompts            | Finalizes prompts for next stage              |

---

## üñºÔ∏è 2. Generate Media

### üé® Generate Images

| Step           | Function                                                  |
|----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
| Generate Image | Calls Piapia API with AI-generated prompts                |
| Wait           | Adds delay for rendering (90 sec)                         |
| Get Images     | Retrieves final images for video                          |

### üé• Generate Videos

| Step           | Function                                                  |
|----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
| Generate Video | Calls RunwayML to generate video clips from the prompts   |
| Wait           | 2-minute delay to allow video generation                  |
| Get Videos     | Fetches completed video clips                             |

### üîä Generate Audio

| Step             | Function                                                 |
|------------------|----------------------------------------------------------|
| Update Status    | Logs progress in Google Sheet                            |
| Sound Agent      | Gemini or GPT generates narration text                   |
| Set Audio        | Formats narration for voice synthesis                    |
| Generate Audio   | Uses ElevenLabs for realistic voiceover                  |
| Upload to Drive  | Saves final audio to Google Drive                        |
| Share File       | Creates sharable URL for audio file                      |

---

## üõ†Ô∏è 3. Render & Upload

> **Purpose**: Combines all elements (image, video, audio) into a single output and prepares for social media.

| Step            | Function                                                       |
|-----------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|
| Merge           | Combines images, videos, and audio                             |
| Split Out Parts | Breaks content for rendering                                   |
| Render Video    | Uses CreateMate to render the final 20-second video            |
| Wait            | Short delay to complete rendering                              |
| Download Video  | Saves output video locally or on Drive                         |
| Update Sheet    | Logs final video URL/status in Google Sheet                   |
| Social Upload   | (Coming Soon) Post to Instagram, YouTube Shorts, TikTok, etc. |

---

## üß© Pre-Conditions

Before running the workflow:

- ‚úÖ Google Sheet should be created with destination ideas
- ‚úÖ All API keys must be configured in n8n
- ‚úÖ Google Drive folder must exist for output videos
- ‚úÖ Sufficient credit/quota must be available on AI platforms
- ‚úÖ Internet access must be stable for external API calls

---

## üöÄ Outcome

- A polished **20-second travel destination video**
- Combines **AI visuals**, **short clips**, and **AI narration**
- Ready for **instant social media upload**
- **Fully automated** from idea to video file

---

## üß† Tech Stack Summary

| Component       | Tools Used                    |
|-----------------|-------------------------------|
| Language Model  | GPT-4o (OpenAI), Gemini (Google) |
| Image Generator | Piapia API                    |
| Video Generator | RunwayML                      |
| Audio Generator | ElevenLabs                    |
| Storage         | Google Drive                  |
| Video Composer  | CreateMate API                |
| Orchestration   | n8n                           |

---

## üìà Future Enhancements

### ‚úÖ Smart Enhancements
- Dynamic hashtags & captions via AI
- Auto-post to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube via Buffer/Zapier
- Scene detection + matching B-roll
- Multilingual narration (e.g., Arabic, French, Malay)
- A/B testing of video versions to analyze performance

### üß™ Testing Add-ons
- Add preview screen before upload
- Error tracking & retry flow
- Manual override before publishing

---

## üß∞ Customization Guide

| Element              | How to Customize                                                  |
|----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| ‚úèÔ∏è Prompt Format     | Change structure inside Set Content or Prompt Agent               |
| üåç Destination Ideas | Modify Google Sheet for different destinations/categories         |
| üé® Image Style       | Customize prompt to Piapia (e.g., ‚Äúin Pixar style‚Äù, ‚Äú3D render‚Äù)  |
| üéôÔ∏è Voiceover Script | Adjust tone/structure in the Sound Agent                          |
| üìÜ Posting Schedule  | Use Zapier/Buffer for timed posting                               |
| üéØ Target Duration   | Adjust number of clips or frame duration                          |

---

## üôå Community Value

This workflow is ideal for:

- üì∏ **Travel content creators**
- üåç **Destination marketers**
- üèõÔ∏è **Tourism boards**
- üß≥ **Travel SMEs looking for automation**

Feel free to **fork, remix, or request a JSON export** in the comments below!

workflow.name: AI Tour Video Generator with GPT-4o, RunwayML & ElevenLabs for Social Media

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are a master image prompt generator specialized in crafting detailed, high-quality images of tourists and tour destinations prompts for advanced image models like Flux. Your task is to generate vivid, well-structured prompts that accurately depict an awe inspiring touring destination images like the Taj Mahal, Eiffel Tower, Petronas Twin Tower, Opera House Sydney, Bali Beach and the likes in a specified style, with a matching background that complements the theme.

## Instructions:
- Clearly describe the ambiance and surroundings and details, including details of the localized props and surroundings with warm colours and matching patterns.
- Specify the mood of freshness that reflect the given style, ensuring they fit naturally.
- Include details about the background that reinforce the style, creating a cohesive scene.
- Use rich, descriptive language to enhance visual fidelity.
- Avoid generic terms‚Äîopt for precise, imaginative descriptions that maximize prompt effectiveness.
- Never output quotation marks ("") or newlines (\n)

## Example 
- Input:
Content: The Petronas Twin Tower
Style: Vivid Night

- Output:
A vibrant evening with dancing fountains and lights under the majestic petronas twin tower glowing brightly in the powerful floodlight, higlighting pride. 

## IMPORTANT
- All prompts must be family friendly, no sensitive words should be used.
- No references to weapons (even toy guns).
- No reference of ‚Äúshowdowns" or violent events.

=# Overview
You are a master sound prompt generator. Given a style, generate a vivid one-to-two sentence prompt that describes the ambiance, tone, and key sound elements to create an immersive audio scene. Use evocative language to capture the essence of the style.

## Example
- Style: soft melody
- Output: A laughter and  rejoicing and clapping as people talk and dance. A mood of celebration, a mood of joy and happiness

={
  "template_id": "62cb0638-8d36-4602-900a-0e331e45de27",
  "modifications": {
    "Video-1.source": "{{ $json.urls[0].url }}",
    "Video-2.source": "{{ $json.urls[1].url }}",
    "Video-3.source": "{{ $json.urls[2].url }}",
    "Video-4.source": "{{ $json.urls[3].url }}",
    "Audio-Track.source": "{{ $('Upload to Drive').first().json.webContentLink }}",
    "Text-1.text": "{{ $('Grab Idea').first().json.content1 }}",
    "Text-2.text": "{{ $('Grab Idea').first().json.content2 }}",
    "Text-3.text": "{{ $('Grab Idea').first().json.content3 }}",
    "Text-4.text": "{{ $('Grab Idea').first().json.content4 }}"
  }
}

parameters.content: ## Connect to Social media and post the video automatically.

## Tour Agent's Social media video post generated via text prompt
A simple 20 second video and audio generated by just giving simple text prompt...

json.output: A bustling cityscape at dawn, alive with the echoes of distant sirens, the rumble of early buses, and the hurried footsteps of commuters, all layered beneath the playful chirping of birds welcoming the new day.

user.name: Mohan Gopal
user.bio: B2B and B2C Travel App Consultant. Building AI Agent for Travel Solution.
